context: Hello there! What kind of movies are you into?
I'm good, I hope you are as well?
Animated films like Wreck-It Ralph (2012) or Big Hero 6 (2014)
Those are great films! How about Toy Story (1995) ?
I also really enjoyed Rio (2011) I just learned there was a Rio 2 (2014) I'll have to check out too
Are you into some of the Japanese films like Howl's Moving Castle ? We love that one. So imaginative.
I didn't see Toy Story 2 (1999) Toy Story 3 (2010) or Toy Story 4 (2018)
resp: You have to see Rio 2 (2014) . Especially if you liked the first one.
